description:
Xcode: Example install of language specification for Xcode 4.x.

go.xclangspec is identical to the one in misc/xcode/3/, except for the heading.

Partial workaround for issue 2401.

messages.text: Sorry about opening this issue, should have revised and uploaded to the original issue 5723049 (now removed).

Hello gri@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

LGTM.
Thanks.
- gri
